::Zardus::

Zardus smiles at Lavatron's answer. "Excellent. I need you to go with 
this bot," he points at Starscream, "And help him kill Megatron. He 
can provide any info you may need."

Zardus recieves Battera's and Zergling's transmissions. He activates 
his comm, sending a transmission to Battera.

"The Maximals have retreated," the transmission read, "And we have 
recruited a new gestalt."

Zardus switches to Zergling's frequency, replying to his question. 
"Monitor the scanners for now," he says, "If any Maximal enters our 
territory, notify me immediately."
